newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Northland Cranberries still a hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Northland Cranberries still a hold.

text.p: Dain Bosworth Inc analyst Bonnie Wittenburg said Wednesday an announcement by Northland Cranberries Inc naming one of its board members as president and chief operating officer is positive and indicates a possible succession plan is in place.
Jerold Kaminski, a North Cranberries board member, is currently a vice president at General Mills Inc.
Dain Bosworth views Kaminski as the probable successor to Chairman and Chief Executive Officer John Swendrowski, said in a report.
Wittenburg maintains a hold rating on the stock.
Shares of Northland Cranberries closed up 2-5/8 to 15-5/8.
